title: Camco Water Bandit | Features a Highly Flexible Silicone-Polymer Sleeve, an ABS Male Water Hose Connection, and Works with Damaged or Stripped Faucet Threads or Faucets without Threads (22484)
description: Camco's Water Bandit connects your standard water hose to previously unattachable water sources, allowing you to stop wasting water. This product measures 3 ¼-inches long. One end connects to a standard water hose (via a standard ABS male water hose connection). The other end (a highly flexible, silicone-polymer sleeve), stretches to fit over the end of most standard water sources—including damaged/stripped threads, or water sources with no threads at all. This product is drinking water safe and compliant with all federal and state level low lead laws. CSA Low Lead Content Certified to NSF/ANSI 372. Note: Not intended for non-threaded kitchen sink faucets or use under pressure.
